extendedInfo.description: We are proud to present the CattleFax Android application that provides you with specialized cattle industry information from our award winning analysts. Our app is a true go to, deciding factor, for your everyday beef industry data & information needs.The CattleFax Android application enable users to browse cattle prices, view dynamic charts, graphs and industry data, examine our catalog of industry news and check detailed, local and national weather forecasts.The CattleFax App help our users to follow the futures markets and get up to date information from the single source of all information on the Beef Industry.Optimized for daily use by beef producers and traders, users of our apps can save their favorite data sections and information in the apps for quick and easy access, view daily Closing Bell and Market Minute Videos from our analysts, share and post news and market information to Facebook, Twitter and Linkedin from the App with your associates and colleagues, learn more about conferences, events and seminars happening in your area and around the countryDetailed data, features and information in the CattleFax applications Include:â¢ Fed Cattle Dataâ¢ Futures Dataâ¢ CattleFax Price Dataâ¢ Sales Summariesâ¢ Estimated Show listsâ¢ Placements & Shipment Dataâ¢ Historical Basis per State & Locationâ¢ Weekly Dataâ¢ Steer Trading Dataâ¢ Inventory Dataâ¢ Monthly Carryoverâ¢ Live Cattle Basisâ¢ Cash Corn Pricingâ¢ Choice / Select Spread Dataâ¢ Weekly US Cow Slaughter Dataâ¢ Total Production Numbersâ¢ Carcass Weightsâ¢ Producer / Trader Calculatorsâ¢ Beef Industry Featured Articles & Newsâ¢ Market Minute Information, Videos & Audioâ¢ Closing Bell Information, Videos & Audioâ¢ Art's Weather with Extended Outlook & Updatesâ¢ Detailed Weather Reports & Data per locationâ¢ Seminar Informationâ¢ User Settings & Favourites Sectionâ¢ Meet the CattleFax Analystsâ¢ and more...For over 40 years, CattleFax's focus has been information on, by, and for the beef industry. We are the global leader in beef industry research, analysis, and information. Since 1968, our exclusive industry database has set the standard for market information and analysis. Our expertise translates to a more profitable bottom line - whether you are a beef producer, allied industry business partner, or financial institution.CattleFax is not a stakeholder in the market - we are an information and analysis service designed to meet the unique needs of the beef industry. When it comes to providing you with the tools you need to make profitable decisions - CattleFax is the deciding factor.The CattleFax Android application is proudly sponsored by Pfizer Animal Health.

reviews.title: Quick, complete app
reviews.comment: Only crashed a couple times on my old S1. Did not register as a member, but what I could get to looked fantastic!
reviews.author: Brian Hale

reviews.title: ultimate app
reviews.comment: I am very happy with the multiple benifits of this app. It shows the latest cattles prices, it shows weather forcast and many more.
reviews.author: peter lindberg

reviews.title: Great features
reviews.comment: This app has a lots of unique features which I have never seen earlier in any app. Features like measuring the values, keep records of all months and any more.
reviews.author: jickson routs

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Must say that app is realy awesome. Graphs are extremely gr8. Nic work.. I am loving it..
reviews.author: Prabhjot Singh

reviews.title: App review
reviews.comment: Nice app, easy to use and provide useful information about cattle and beef industry.

reviews.title: Industry news on phone
reviews.comment: it\'s great to get all latest industry news and updates on phone.
reviews.author: mark rony

reviews.title: Daily updates
reviews.comment: its provide me daily updates of cattle industry with cattle price,view dynamic  charts, check local and national weather forecast and it help me alot.
reviews.author: danial david

reviews.title: Useful data
reviews.comment: The app\'s dashboard has very useful data in multiple options that provides a real view of market on your phone

reviews.title: Specialist of Cattle Business
reviews.comment: I am using this app for a long span of time and I am very satisfy with the results which it gave to me. This app is must for any cattle business.

reviews.title: Seminars
reviews.comment: Seminars are the essential part of market research and the app is really helpful in poviding the latest news about the seminars going to be held any where. its good one.

reviews.title: Excellent features
reviews.comment: This app provides me detailed data,information of cattle market. it has lots of feature like fed cattle data, future data, weekly data, sales summaries etc. it is very helpful for me ..... thanks

reviews.title: News and update
reviews.comment: This app provide me daily updates and news on cattle industry. Thanks

reviews.title: Requires Subscription
reviews.comment: Would it kill the dev to put in the  description \"requires subscription\" I registered for nothing. I want my email address deleted from your data base if I cant access anything. Disappointed.

reviews.title: very helpfull
reviews.comment: I found this app very beneficial to boost my cattle business.
